Class ChecksumProvider

  • public class ChecksumProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.data/ChecksumProvider.java

    Class for providing checksums from local cache.

    1.0
    Author:
    Jaromír Staněk
